description:
The code and test was added here:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/194089/

That code has a time.sleep(1) in it but it's not mocked out, making the test take at least one second:

http://logs.openstack.org/87/212487/1/check/gate-nova-python27/784bf7e/console.html.gz#_2015-08-13_11_40_21_236

This is a bit of a nit, but we should always be mocking out time.sleep in unit tests.
title: nova.tests.unit.virt.hyperv.test_pathutils.PathUtilsTestCase.test_rmtree should mock out time.sleep

comments.content:
The code and test was added here:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/194089/

That code has a time.sleep(1) in it but it's not mocked out, making the test take at least one second:

http://logs.openstack.org/87/212487/1/check/gate-nova-python27/784bf7e/console.html.gz#_2015-08-13_11_40_21_236

This is a bit of a nit, but we should always be mocking out time.sleep in unit tests.

Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/214307
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/214307
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=ec5879d3aa85f305f2ed91d26f0529e283586c89
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit ec5879d3aa85f305f2ed91d26f0529e283586c89
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Aug 18 12:22:53 2015 -0700

    hyper-v: mock time.sleep in test_rmtree
    
    Added in change I8c194320dfa0c9a00ede3cd5bf38446f896156e3, test_rmtree
    always takes at least one second because time.sleep(1) is not mocked
    out. It's a bit of a nit but we should always mock out sleep calls so
    the tests run as fast as possible - which matters when you have over 13K
    of them.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1486203
    
    Change-Id: I9148849574b05e4168876478af5173028b42074c
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Dave Walker (<email address hidden>) on branch: stable/kilo
Review: https://review.openstack.org/223290
Reason: Kilo is now approaching EOL.  We are in freeze pending the final release and no freeze exception has been raised.  Therefore I am abandoning this change, if it is required in the release - please restore and raise a request.  Thanks
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
